thread.title: Britney Spears Reveals She Prefers Shopping Over Reading in Bizarre Snapchat Videos: Watch!
thread.title_full: Britney Spears Reveals She Prefers Shopping Over Reading in Bizarre Snapchat Videos: Watch!

author: Desiree Murphy
title: Britney Spears Reveals She Prefers Shopping Over Reading in Bizarre Snapchat Videos: Watch!
text: Britney Spears Reveals She Prefers Shopping Over Reading in Bizarre Snapchat Videos: Watch! by Desiree Murphy 3:56   Photo: Getty Images Britney Spears just wants a carefree shopping spree -- abroad, that is! The "Make Me…" singer took to Instagram on Tuesday, sharing a series of hilarious videos taken via Snapchat. WATCH: Britney Spears Says She's ‘Feeling Good About 2017' Using the app's popular bear filter, the 35-year-old pop star informed fans of some advice she recently received from her BFF after seemingly having a bad day. Needless to say, it doesn't sound like Spears will be listening to her pal anytime soon! "My best friend told me today that everything's going to be OK and that I need to be mindful and I need to read more books," she said in the video. "But honestly all I really wanna do is go to Paris and shop!" Jan 17, 2017 at 11:31am PST Wonderfully bizarre, as always! RELATED: 27 Things We Learned About Britney Spears From Her Wonderfully Bizarre Instagram Quickly after the posts went live, one fan offered a genius solution to Spears' vacation dreams: "Go to Paris girl and read a book on the plane!" Others suspected this might mean there's trouble in paradise with her rumored new beau, personal trainer Sam Asghari . As ET previously reported, Spears and Asghari first sparked romance rumors last November when he starred in her "Slumber Party" music video. She revealed via Instagram that she rang in 2017 with Asghari by her side, posting a sweet pic of the two cuddled up inside a booth at Catch LA in Los Angeles. The blonde beauty also shared a steamy shirtless pic of the Persian fitness model via Twitter last Friday, simply captioning it, "Mad love for this one." Hear more (and see the snap!) in the video below.
